name: Imoni Events
address: Scottsdale, AZ (Specific street address not found in search results)
description: Refined wedding planning and design for destination celebrations, rooted in timeless style and sophisticated charm. They emphasize personalized planning and have received high praise for their organization and ability to make the planning process enjoyable

name: TruElegance LLC
description: A wedding and event planning team that serves the Arizona South Asian community, aiming to create perfect days with lasting memories. They offer customizable packages

name: Apropos Creations
address: Chandler, AZ (Specific street address not found in search results)
description: A multicultural wedding and event planner known for accommodating diverse events, including multi-day elaborate Indian weddings. They offer a la carte planning and full-service wedding planning

name: Events by DB
address: Phoenix, AZ (Specific street address not found in search results)
description: An experienced and certified event and wedding planning team specializing in South Asian/multi-culture weddings. They have over 30 years of combined experience and access to various vendors

name: The Fairmont Scottsdale Princess
description: This resort offers an elegant approach to micro-weddings and is noted for its ability to host South Asian weddings, blending elegance with Southwestern allure. They have extensive event spaces and can cater to cultural nuances

name: Bella Rose Estate
description: A romantic, all-inclusive venue with customizable micro-wedding and elopement packages, featuring lush gardens. They are noted for making the planning process stress-free

name: The Scott Resort & Spa
description: Offers a tropical-meets-mid-century design aesthetic with packages for micro-weddings and elopements, providing a sense of privacy and a boutique hideaway feel

name: The Wright House
description: A wedding venue in Mesa with garden sites, offering indoor and outdoor reception options. It has been a wedding venue since 1991 and is described as unique and lush. It is also listed as a venue that can host Indian weddings

name: Crowne Plaza Phoenix Chandler Golf Resort
description: This resort offers multicultural wedding packages that can accommodate Indian wedding ceremonies and has been planning successful weddings for over 100 years

name: Bengali Cultural Association of Arizona (BCAA)
address: 1527 E Briarwood Ter, Phoenix, AZ 85048 (This is listed as a principal officer's address, not necessarily a business address for services)
description: A non-profit organization focused on celebrating and promoting Bengali culture in the Phoenix area. While they organize cultural events, they do not appear to offer direct micro-wedding planning services
